issue.title: [R] Add Raspberry Pi CI build to nightlies
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14455](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14455). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that we support Raspberry Pi OS (<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11506),> and it might be possible to set up a 32-bit ARM CI which reflects the Rasberry Pi (<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11506#issuecomment-949897509)> , we could set up a nightly build for this.
